name: droop (texnoforge)
description:
A tiny game made in 12 days for Black and White Jam #8↷∞
by texnoforge and friends in Godot engine.

Theme of the game is loop, and it only uses black and white colors.

You can play on a keyboard:

  • move: W/S/A/D or arrow keys
  • action: E or F or SPACE

Or even better, you can play on a controller (it somehow works in browsers).

  • move: left stick
  • action: any front button

Credits:

  • 🐒 coding: voice of texnoforge
  • 🎵 music: Dr. Avocadough
  • 🔊 sound: Neureal
  • 🎨 graphics: Ikesawakie

It's not the greatest game of all time, but
